name: Master Alchemist
description: The Master Alchemist is a medium humanoid known for its cunning use of alchemical concoctions and effects to control the battlefield while supporting allies. It has an exceptional Intelligence that fuels its magical effects and a good Armor Class due to studded leather armor.
memorable: Combines potent offensive capabilities with battlefield control through unique concoction effects.
goals: To confuse and hinder enemies while providing healing support to allies.
relations: May be encountered with other alchemists or creatures that use poison or gas-based attacks.
environment: Often found in laboratories, alchemical workshops, or places rich in magical ingredients.
strengths: High Intelligence enhances spellcasting abilities, and it has good durability with a high HP.
weaknesses: Average physical attributes make it vulnerable in direct melee confrontations.
attacks: Utilizes Hasty Concoction attacks dealing versatile damage with various debilitating effects like Disorienting Vapors.
most_powerful_ability: Explosive Flask, which deals significant fire damage in a wide area.
skills: Proficient with alchemist’s supplies, able to double its proficiency bonus for related checks.
additional_information: Uses Healing Unguent to restore hit points to allies.
Can create various battlefield effects like Poisonous Cloud and Slick Floor.
Has specialized tactics involving area control and support.
Utilizes Protective Draught for damage resistance.
Capable of making multiple attacks in a turn.
